name: Make your application
description: Make your completely online application via the online form below.

name: Confirm and payment
description: Once we apply your application, you will receive an email to confirm the process and make payment.

name: Get your device and start using it
description: Once we receive your payment, we will send your device to your address.

name: Return your device
description: After your rental period ends, we will come to your address to pick up the device.
